definitions.definition: Associating to each element of the codomain exactly one element of the domain ; establishing a perfect ( one-to-one ) correspondence between the elements of the domain and the codomain; ( formally ) both injective and surjective .
Having a component that is (specified to be) a bijective map; that specifies a bijective map.

main_definition: ( mathematics , of a function ) Associating to each element of the codomain exactly one element of the domain ; establishing a perfect ( one-to-one ) correspondence between the elements of the domain and the codomain; ( formally ) both injective and surjective .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) Having a component that is (specified to be) a bijective map; that specifies a bijective map.
